title: Re: Repeat repeat repeat repeat repeat repeat...
content:
Taking average height measurements for 8 year olds [Billy] of 51 inches, we can brake this down into inches per pixel, = 2.2 inches per pixel, or 5.5cm per pixel.

Yorps are then 116cm tall, and Gargs are 161cm [Average eyestalk height.]

And the vorticons are of course, 177cm to eartip, just below adult human height.A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: hehe
content: Pseudo-math aside, where'd you get the starting value of 51cm for Billy?

title: Re: hehe
content:
The starting value of height for Billy came from my rather up to date statistics textbook, page 76, average height vs age for boys and girls I'm not sure if this is average NZ height, but the inches suggest an americian average. [Yes, all the stats in that book are real.]

The 'pseudo' maths is pretty good I think. I dobut given a starting height there is a better method.A proud member of the signature stealing society

title: oh!
content:
Ah, gotcha. Kinda funny to think that Vorticons aren't quite as tall as I am. For some reason, I'd always considered their size relative to Keen, without considering Keen's height relative to the rest of the human world.

That makes the Shikadi rather short, doesn't it? :-P
